an4.255:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attana jaradhammo samano jaradhammamyeva pariyesati;
an4.255:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attana jaradhammo samano jaradhamme adinavam viditva ajaram anuttaram yogakkhemam nibbanam pariyesati;
an4.255:2.4: attana byadhidhammo samano byadhidhamme adinavam viditva abyadhim anuttaram yogakkhemam nibbanam pariyesati;
an4.255:2.5: attana maranadhammo samano maranadhamme adinavam viditva amatam anuttaram yogakkhemam nibbanam pariyesati;
an4.255:2.6: attana sankilesadhammo samano sankilesadhamme adinavam viditva asankilittham anuttaram yogakkhemam nibbanam pariyesati.
